ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 24
ygData.msgSnippet: You ll know things are trivial when you try to do it. You will get a message something to the effect of this has become trivial... . I don t remember the
ygData.messageBody:
You'll know things are trivial when you try to do it. You will get a message
something to the effect of "this has become trivial...". I don't remember
the exact words. There is also another book for smithing, dealing with
Smithing Weapons and Armor. This is the one that explains how to make Banded
armor. Note that currently, despite the book's name, you cannot make
weapons. I've found the book in East Freeport. I'm not sure of all the
locations.


David Burkhart

> know when it does become trivial? Also is there a book you can by in the
> game that tells you how to make banded armor and different stuff?
> I have no
> idea what I need and I just have the basic blacksmithing book.
